questionTitle: Dear all, just to let you know that we reached our ____ after a dramatic start.
I could say that we are having a wonderful time but that would be____ from the truth.
Everything started to go wrong the moment we arrived at the airport because of the industrial ____ taken by the baggage handlers.
These baggage handlers had decided they didn't want to ____ our cases on to the plane.
The result of this was that we were held ____ for six hours in the departure lounge waiting for the end of the dispute.
By the time the plane took off as you can ____ , we were all tired, hungry and miserable.
When we eventually arrived at the hotel, we had to ____ our luggage at reception.
The big problem was that our luggage wasn't there ? it had simply____ .
Our first day was spent in the local shops ____ all the things that we believed we had brought with us.
On the last day of our holiday the manager of the hotel greeted us____ from ear to ear to inform us that our luggage had arrived at reception!See you soon.Meggy and Tom.
